diagram_descriptions: A pop-up mechanism is shown in a diagram with labels indicating 'move side', 'table', and 'this side'. The mechanism appears to be a simple box structure with angled sides.
A diagram shows a partially constructed pop-up element with colored paper pieces and a pencil. The background is a green cutting mat. Tools like scissors and a protractor are visible.
Two historical astronomical diagrams are shown side-by-side. The left diagram is labeled 'Mars' and the right is labeled 'Sol et Venus'. Both are circular with intricate details and text.
A pop-up box structure is shown with tools like scissors, a ruler, and a pencil on a green cutting mat. The pop-up box is partially assembled and appears to be a model for a larger project.

tools_reference.name: Cookie cutter set into plywood
tools_reference.use: Cutting and scoring press sheets for commercial pop-up books

diagram_descriptions: A diagram showing the die-line for a tool box pop-up. It includes two main pieces: a top piece with a curved top edge and two tabs, and a bottom piece with score lines indicated by dashed lines and cut lines indicated by solid lines. The bottom piece has two symmetrical cutouts on the sides and a central fold line.
A photograph of a finished pop-up tool box with various tools inside, such as scissors, a ruler, and a saw, set against a blue background with a circular saw graphic.
